package Lec6;

public class Inverse_of_number {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int n = 32145;
		int pos = 1;
		int ans = 0;
		while (n > 0) {
			int rem = n % 10;
			ans = (int) (ans + pos * (Math.pow(10, rem - 1)));
			n /= 10;
			pos++;
		}
		System.out.println(ans);

	}

}
